short_summary: Food and accommodation services for the National Sentry Program (NSP)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 11, 2023 at 2:00PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.   Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for food and accommodation services to support the National Sentry Program (NSP) that could include: up to 60 single-occupancy room with associated supplies, one (1) meeting room with associated supplies, one (1) on-site cafeteria/dining accommodation with associated supplies, meal preparation services and laundry access. DND will conduct the NSP in Ottawa, Ontario, annually from April to November. The Period of any resulting contract will be from contract award to March 31, 2026 inclusive and will include 2 irrevocable 1-year option periods to extend the contract under the same terms and conditions.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
=====================

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Solicitation Number

WS3826138444

### Title

RFP for Accommodation Services to Support the Department of National Defence's National Sentry Program

### Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting proposals for food and accommodation services to support the National Sentry Program (NSP). The program requires:

* Up to 60 single-occupancy rooms with associated supplies
* One meeting room with associated supplies
* One on-site cafeteria/dining accommodation with associated supplies
* Meal preparation services
* Laundry access

The services will be required in Ottawa, Ontario, annually from April to November. The period of any resulting contract will be from contract award to March 31, 2026, inclusive, with two irrevocable one-year option periods to extend the contract under the same terms and conditions.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: April 11, 2023, at 14:00 HAE
* **Publication Date**: February 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

### Tendering Process

The tender process is subject to the following:

* Lowest Price selection criteria
* Open bidding
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) agreements apply.

### Contact Information

For pre-tender questions, please refer to the event messaging system. For all other inquiries, please contact:

Grant, Ryan (SPAC/PSPC)
ryan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15521604?extsite=MTU1MjE2MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Attachment

None

### Tender Status

Expired
